layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x52
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x52
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x20
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutInline {A} at (0,0) size 313x19 [color=#008000]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 313x19
            text run at (0,0) width 313: "Whatever you do to this link, it should stay green."
        LayoutText {#text} at (313,0) size 196x19
          text run at (313,0) width 196: " (hover, focus, activate, follow)"
